text: Samba Adama (born 12 November 1955) is a Mauritanian freestyle and Greco-Roman wrestler Adama competed for Mauritania at the 1988 Summer Olympics in both disciplines of wrestling, but lost both group matches in each discipline by falls so didn't advance to the next round in either. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic wrestlers of Mauritania Category:Wrestlers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Mauritanian male sport wrestlers
title: Samba Adama
